nodes.text: The Yularen family was an influential family of Humans who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Notable members included Thull Yularen, an instructor at the Anaxes Citadel, and Wullf Yularen, a Republic admiral who went on to serve the Galactic Empire. The family possessed an estate on the planet Anaxes. At some point, the Yularen family, under unknown circumstances, managed to include the Letter from Christophsis, a letter between then-Jedi Apprentice Ahsoka Tano and Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy detailing a first-hand account of the battle, among their documents.
